name: Cherish
description:
A test/prototype game created in RPG Maker MV

Credits

  • Created/developed by porkricebowls
  • Story by porkricebowls and Msher
  • Character and map design by porkricebowls
  • Title screen music by porkricebowls
  • Bug testing by C.O.
  • Additional help by MrMiles and Msher
  • SFX and tilesets built into RPG Maker MV
  • Special thanks to C.O., Msher and MrMiles

The game is a work in progress.  This is only a demo.
